amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 116-392 to clarify that the ABC test included in the PRO Act does not preempt any State laws governing the wages, work hours, workers compensation, or unemployment insurance of employees.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 116-392 to clarify that the ABC test included in the PRO Act does not preempt any State laws governing the wages, work hours, workers compensation, or unemployment insurance of employees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Stevens amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 241 - 178 (Roll no. 41).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Stevens amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 241 - 178 (Roll no. 41).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Stevens.
